Title: Requires landlords to show they have obtained permits for the demolition and construction of a new building and the financial ability to complete such projects when not renewing a lease
Summary: Requires landlords to show they have obtained permits for the demolition and construction of a new building and the financial ability to complete such projects when not renewing a lease.
LawCode: Amd ยง26-511, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring landlords to show they have obtained permits for the demolition and construction of a new building and the financial ability to complete such projects when not renewing a lease
